video.title: Lipstick Jungle
video.synopsis: This stylish, juicy series centers on media mogul Wendy, editor Nico and designer Victory, who each try to balance professional and personal lives.

episodes.synopsis: Movie exec Wendy, fashion maven Victory and magazine editor Nico help each other through the turmoil of their personal and professional lives.
episodes.title: Chapter One: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Wendy's longtime rival publishes a book that portrays her in an unflattering light; Nico gets serious with Kirby; Victory downsizes her company.
episodes.title: Chapter Two: Nothing Sacred

episodes.synopsis: Wendy fights back against allegations that she's a bad mom; Nico puts the breaks on her love life; Victory hires a new male assistant.
episodes.title: Chapter Three: Pink Poison

episodes.synopsis: Wendy takes a risk on a new movie from India; Victory designs a dress for a movie star; Nico spills the beans about her affair with Kirby.
episodes.title: Chapter Four: Bombay Highway

episodes.synopsis: Victory discovers that someone has stolen her designs; Wendy inadvertently gives Shane's music career a boost; Nico can't end her affair with Kirby.
episodes.title: Chapter Five: Dressed to Kill

episodes.synopsis: On a trip to Scotland, Wendy confronts Nico about her affair with Kirby; Victory begins to question Joe's intentions.
episodes.title: Chapter Six: Take the High Road

episodes.synopsis: Wendy contends with a stubborn screenwriter; Nico learns that Charles has had a heart attack; Victory considers a sexy proposition from some swingers.
episodes.title: Chapter Seven: Carpe Threesome

episodes.synopsis: Nico is tormented by guilt over her infidelity; Victory resists Joe's attempts to win her back; Wendy's bossy mother makes a visit.
episodes.title: Chapter Eight: Pandora's Box

episodes.synopsis: Victory starts construction on her new boutique; newly widowed Nico confronts her husband's mistress; the star of Wendy's new film exposes a secret.
episodes.title: Chapter Nine: Help!

episodes.synopsis: Nico contends with her demanding new boss; Victory discovers her new beau has a 10-year-old daughter; Wendy's new movie takes over her life.
episodes.title: Chapter Ten: Let It Be

episodes.synopsis: Unemployed Wendy channels her energy into life at home; Nico's troubled family embarrasses her; Victory meets Rodrigo's daughter.
episodes.title: Chapter Eleven: The F-Word

episodes.synopsis: Lonely Wendy turns to pal Dennis for comfort; Victory has a nightmare about Joe's death; Nico and Kirby clash over money.
episodes.title: Chapter Twelve: Scary, Scary Night!

episodes.synopsis: The grand opening of Victory's new store spirals out of control; Wendy's return to work hits a rough patch; Nico encounters her late husband's lover.
episodes.title: Chapter Thirteen: The Lyin', the Bitch and the Wardrobe

episodes.synopsis: Nico gets a surprise when she meets Kirby's mother; Wendy acts out when Joe gets a new manager; Victory struggles to design a new line.
episodes.title: Chapter Fourteen: Let the Games Begin

episodes.synopsis: Things quickly go awry for Nico, Victory and Wendy when they head to the country for what they thought would be a blissful retreat at a posh spa.
episodes.title: Chapter Fifteen: The Sisterhood of the Traveling Prada

episodes.synopsis: Victory has two days to design a wedding dress; Nico and Kirby look after baby Charlie; Wendy gets overly ambitious preparing Thanksgiving dinner.
episodes.title: Chapter Sixteen: Thanksgiving

episodes.synopsis: Nico and Kirby face a decision regarding baby Charlie; Victory meddles in Maddie's love life; Wendy butts heads with an arrogant producer.
episodes.title: Chapter Seventeen: Bye, Bye Baby

episodes.synopsis: A client wants Victory to pose semi-nude; Nico and Kirby face an awkward situation; work-related tensions spill over into Wendy and Shane's marriage.
episodes.title: Chapter Eighteen: Indecent Exposure

episodes.synopsis: Wendy wants Shane to see a marriage counselor; Nico learns that she has an unlikely new admirer; Victory plans to pop the question to Joe.
episodes.title: Chapter Nineteen: Lovers' Leaps

episodes.synopsis: Nico's big TV appearance goes awry; Victory's parents don't approve of Joe; Wendy deals with the fallout when Shane goes on tour with a big-name band.
episodes.title: Chapter Twenty: La Vie en Pose
